has-ansi

Check if a string has ANSI escape codes

Install

sh $ npm install --save has-ansi

Usage

```js var hasAnsi = require(‘has-ansi’);

hasAnsi(‘\u001b[4mcake\u001b[0m’); //=> true

hasAnsi(‘cake’); //=> false ```

CLI

sh $ npm install --global has-ansi

``` $ has-ansi –help

Usage $ has-ansi $ echo | has-ansi

Exits with code 0 if input has ANSI escape codes and 1 if not ```
